title: Special games people want are like URF not the rest...
body:
People like 
#1 Ultra Rapid fire
#2 6Vs6 Treeline
#3 All Vs one
#4 Poro King
#5 Ascension 

Something like that...

You don't do URF enough

People would like a new one

replies.body:
riot doesnt care about "fun game modes" like urf...

last season they claimed that urf became stagnant because it was unbalanced...

DO THEY NOT FUCKING REALISE THATS WHY WE LOVE URF SO MUCH?

Urf has problems with the new client, deal with it bro. also you don't wanna see the fucking same OP shit over and over, fuck that shit

also WHO THE FUCK LOVES HEXAKILL?

I like hexakill...

More of you half wits to kill!
